Tip.Value: Kopieren Sie den Textinhalt der Datei direkt, ohne die Datei zu öffnen Nicht-Unicode-kodierte Dateien können verstümmelt sein
You do not need to open the file directly copy the file text content, not Unicode encoding may be garbled

Command.Arguments: -noexit write-host '"%1"';$args = 'md5', 'sha1', 'sha256', 'sha384', 'sha512', 'mactripledes', 'ripemd160'; foreach($arg in $args){get-filehash '"%1"' -algorithm $arg | select-object algorithm, hash | format-table -wrap}

CreateFile.Content: Dim wsh On Error Resume Next Set wsh = CreateObject("WScript.Shell") path = "HKCU\Software\Microsoft\Windows\CurrentVersion\Explorer\Advanced\HideFileExt" value = 1 If wsh.RegRead(path) = value Then value = 0 wsh.RegWrite path, value, "REG_DWORD" wsh.SendKeys "{F5}" Set wsh = Nothing

Dim wsh On Error Resume Next Set wsh = CreateObject("WScript.Shell") path = "HKCU\Software\Microsoft\Windows\CurrentVersion\Explorer\Advanced\Hidden" value = 1 If wsh.RegRead(path) = value Then value = 2 wsh.RegWrite path, value, "REG_DWORD" wsh.SendKeys "{F5}" Set wsh = Nothing

Dim wsh On Error Resume Next Set wsh = CreateObject("WScript.Shell") path = "HKCU\Software\Microsoft\Windows\CurrentVersion\Explorer\Advanced\ShowSuperHidden" value = 1 If wsh.RegRead(path) = value Then value = 0 wsh.RegWrite path, value, "REG_DWORD" wsh.SendKeys "{F5}" Set wsh = Nothing

Tip.Value: Nachdem Sie einen Screenshot erstellt haben, können Sie direktCtrl+VBild einfügen Anwendbarer Standort:Word、QQ、PSWarten Hotkey:Win+Shift+S
After taking a screenshot, you can directly press Ctrl+V to paste the picture. It is suitable for Word, PS and other programs. The shortcut key is Win+Shift+S

CreateFile.Content: Dim wsh On Error Resume Next Set wsh = CreateObject("WScript.Shell") path = wsh.RegRead("HKCU\Control Panel\Desktop\WallPaper") wsh.Run("explorer /select, " & path) Set wsh = Nothing

Dim wsh On Error Resume Next Set wsh = CreateObject("WScript.Shell") path = "HKCU\Software\Microsoft\Windows\CurrentVersion\Explorer\ShowDriveLettersFirst" value = 2 If wsh.RegRead(path) = value Then value = 0 wsh.RegWrite path, value, "REG_DWORD" wsh.SendKeys "{F5}" Set wsh = Nothing

Dim wsh On Error Resume Next Set wsh = CreateObject("WScript.Shell") path = "HKLM\SOFTWARE\Classes\Drive\TileInfo" value = "prop:*System.PercentFull;System.Computer.DecoratedFreeSpace;System.Volume.FileSystem" If wsh.RegRead(path) = value Then value = "prop:System.FreeSpace;System.Capacity" End If wsh.RegWrite path, value wsh.SendKeys "{F5}" Set wsh = Nothing

Tip.Value: Systemeigene Menüelemente müssen gedrückt werdenShiftzeigen, Dieser Artikel kann direkt angezeigt werden, Pfad ohne doppelte Anführungszeichen
The system raw lettuce item needs to hold down Shift display, this item can be displayed directly, path without double quotation marks
Systemeigene Menüelemente müssen gedrückt werdenShiftzeigen, Dieser Artikel kann direkt angezeigt werden, Pfad mit doppelten Anführungszeichen
The system raw lettuce item needs to hold down Shift display, this item can be displayed directly, path with double quotation marks

REG_SZ.MUIVerb: Erstellen Sie eine Verknüpfung auf dem Desktop

CreateFile.Content: Dim wsh, fso, shortcut Set paths = WScript.Arguments Set wsh = CreateObject("WScript.Shell") Set fso = CreateObject("Scripting.FileSystemObject") desktop = wsh.SpecialFolders("Desktop") For i = 0 To paths.Count - 1 path = paths(i) index1 = InstrRev(path, "\") dir = Mid(path, 1, index1 - 1) name = Mid(path, index1 + 1) index2 = InstrRev(name, ".") If index2 > 0 Then name = Mid(name, 1, index2 - 1) lnkPath = "" j = 1 Do lnkPath = desktop & "\" & name If j > 1 Then lnkPath = lnkPath & " (" & j & ")" lnkPath = lnkPath & ".lnk" j = j + 1 Loop While fso.FileExists(lnkPath) Set shortcut = wsh.CreateShortcut(lnkPath) shortcut.TargetPath = path shortcut.WorkingDirectory = dir shortcut.Save Next Set shortcut = Nothing Set wsh = Nothing Set fso = Nothing

Tip.Value: lösen Hyper-V Und VirtualBox inkompatibles Problem
Fixed an issue where Hyper-V and VirtualBox could not coexist

Command.Arguments: <CreateFile FileName='HyperVMode.vbs' Content=' Dim sap, wsh Set sap = CreateObject("Shell.Application") sap.ShellExecute "bcdedit", "/set hypervisorlaunchtype auto", "" ,"runas", 0 msg = "You are currently switching mode to Hyper-V," & VbCrlf msg = msg & "This mode is available using Windows SandBox and Hyper-V," & VbCrlf msg = msg & "But Vm programs such as VirtualBox and VMware cannot be used," & VbCrlf msg = msg & "Do you want to restart the computer immediately to apply the mode?" & VbCrlf msg = msg & "You can also restart yourself later, please save your work!" If Msgbox(msg, VbYesNo + VbInformation, "Virtual Mode") = VbYes Then Set wsh = CreateObject("WScript.Shell") wsh.Run("shutdown -r -f -t 00") Set wsh = Nothing End If de-DE

<CreateFile FileName='VirtualBoxMode.vbs' Content=' Dim sap, wsh Set sap = CreateObject("Shell.Application") sap.ShellExecute "bcdedit", "/set hypervisorlaunchtype off", "", "runas", 0 msg = "You are currently switching mode to VirtualBox，" & VbCrlf msg = msg & "This mode is available using VM programs such as VirtualBox and VMware," & VbCrlf msg = msg & "But Windows SandBox and Hyper-V are not available," & VbCrlf msg = msg & "Do you want to restart the computer immediately to apply the mode?" & VbCrlf msg = msg & "You can also restart yourself later, please save your work!" If Msgbox(msg, VbYesNo + VbInformation, "Virtual Mode") = VbYes Then Set wsh = CreateObject("WScript.Shell") wsh.Run("shutdown -r -f -t 00") Set wsh = Nothing End If de-DE
/c cd %temp% & del BatteryReport.html & powercfg /batteryreport /output BatteryReport.html & start BatteryReport.html

CreateFile.Content: taskkill /f /im explorer.exe del /f /s /q /a "%LocalAppData%\IconCache.db" cd /d "%LocalAppData%\Microsoft\Windows\Explorer" del /f /s /q /a thumbcache_*.db del /f /s /q /a iconcache_*.db reg delete "HKCR\Local Settings\Software\Microsoft\Windows\CurrentVersion\TrayNotify" /v IconStreams /f reg delete "HKCR\Local Settings\Software\Microsoft\Windows\CurrentVersion\TrayNotify" /v PastIconsStream /f start explorer

Command.Arguments: advfirewall firewall add rule name = "%1" dir = in program = "%1" action = block
advfirewall firewall add rule name = "%1" dir = out program = "%1" action = block
advfirewall firewall delete rule name = "%1" dir = in program = "%1"
advfirewall firewall delete rule name = "%1" dir = out program = "%1"
